analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/40/0xf085d3b02f5e1ed8c1b92f5ae313aedf97caa2e6.sol:
	Contract LSTC has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/40/0xf085d3b02f5e1ed8c1b92f5ae313aedf97caa2e6.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/40/0xf085d3b02f5e1ed8c1b92f5ae313aedf97caa2e6.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
